title: coin-score.ai
author: coin-score.ai
content: Significant Developments: Alchemy Pay expanded to provide direct-to-customer solutions, including a fiat-crypto on and off-ramp and an NFT checkout system.Integrations:Introduction of functionalities like fiat-crypto on-ramp and off-ramp.Integrations with various exchanges, wallets, games, and blockchain networks.Partnerships with major networks such as Arbitrum, Polygon, VeChain, and Algorand.Incorporation of Ethereum Name Service (ENS) for smoother payments.Offline Events:Alchemy Pay provided the fiat-crypto payment system at the Venice Biennale and Artaverse in Hong Kong.Demonstrated their merchant crypto payment system at the Mandala Weekender, a VIP Formula 1 after-party.Crypto Payment Acceptance Expansion:Collaboration with instpower and Binance Pay for crypto payment acceptance.Integration with various popular tokens.Entrance into the Australian and New Zealand markets and further global expansion.Awards and Events:Received the "Crypto Payment Gateway of the Year 2022" award.Participation in various industry conferences and events.Sports and Promotional Partnerships:Partnership with soccer legend Javier Mascherano.Sponsorship of Spanish football club Real Betis.Charitable Efforts: Partnership with Shamiri Institute to improve mental health for young adults in Africa.Fintech Partnerships:Collaborations with major entities in the traditional financial space.Partnerships with fintech and e-commerce firms to bolster services.ACH Listings: Alchemy Pay's ACH token was listed on over 30 centralized and decentralized exchanges in 2022.https://coin-score.ai/cryptoprojects/fundamental-analysis-of-the-alchemy-pay-cryptocurrency/
